features.External Carapace: The warform can use their carapace like a shield, allowing them to use the Brace action.
features.Martial Expertise: The warform can use their Strike action twice on their turn.

action.name: Strike: Axe
action.description: Attack +4, reach 5 ft., one target. The warform can jump up to 10ft before or after making this attack. Graze: 3 (1d6) impact damage. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) keen damage.

action.name: Strike: Shorbow
action.description: Attack +3, range 80/320 ft., one target. Graze: 3 (1d6) impact damage. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) impact damage.

reaction.name: Warpair Coordination (Costs 1 Focus)
reaction.description: After another warform within 5ft of this warform takes the Move action, this warform moves up to their movement rate, ending their movement within 5ft of the other warform.
